Title: Reassortment
Writer: Jonathan Nolan (created by), Tony Camerino, Lucas O'Connor (executive story editor), Tony Camerino (story editor)
Actors: Jim Caviezel, Kevin Chapman, Amy Acker, Sarah Shahi
Plot: Reese and Finch become trapped in a hospital that becomes ground zero for a deadly viral outbreak. Also, Samaritan's newest recruit has second thoughts and Shaw continues to struggle with reality.
